short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard shortcuts for common actions on Threads.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds keyboard shortcuts for navigating Threads.net, allowing users to quickly create new posts, search, view their profile, check activity, and access saved and liked posts with ease. Alt/Option + N, P, A, and other shortcuts make your Threads.net experience more efficient.
